entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
